attributes.action: Stop Taxing the life out of Britian
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When will the government stop taxing the life out of ordinary working people?
Not content with tax on earnings, savings,Death etc etc , they now want to tax car parking spaces on private companies own land! This will end up with us being taxed for the number or cars we have on our drives next. Come on WAKE UP before the people rise up in anger and get rid of the useless, tax burdening  lot of you.

rejection.details: Can you please reword your petition so that it is specific to an action or particular government policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
